variable.name: np_otherneuro
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at the time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mr_otherneuro
variable.description: Exclude for brain injury or disease other than prevalent stroke or dementia at the time of MRI

variable.name: mr_prevdem
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at the time of MRI

variable.name: np_prevdem
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent dementia at the time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mr_prevstrk
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at the time of MRI

variable.name: np_prevstrk
variable.description: Exclude for prevalent stroke at the time of Neuropsychology battery

variable.name: mri_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality. Number of days since exam 1.

variable.name: np_date
variable.comment: Date includes month, day and year, however coding manual displays only month and year to preserve confidentiality.
